content: Badly needs an update. Can't play on modern phones or tablets.
Most replayable card game I have ever played.

What's good: - Really good ui and mobile implementation - Online gameplay works great and has fast notifications in case you are not in game when next turn starts. What's less good: - The game seems to only work in one aspect ratio. When playing on my OnePlus 6 I have black bars on the sides but the ui also get cut on top and bottom so that some text and options does not appear on screen. Game is still playable though. all a great implementation of an already great game.
Keeps crashing and asking me to update when I have the latest version!
speechless... known issues: the two expansion cards that let you discard a genes good to lower the cost of settling by 3 only works if you are able to pay the full price of settling.
App opens, but I can't start a game or access settings on my Samsung S20.
A good app for a terrific game. Rftg is one of the best board games you can play, hands down.
This app will not work properly on newer hardware and newer versions of Android. It won't work on my Pixel 5. It needs an update.
One of the world's best tabletop games. Fantastic digital version.
Would like to learn this game but the resolution issue makes it difficult to play.

The app needs an update. I was able to open and run it but the top part of the screen was cut off. If there were buttons to close or go back on certain screens, I couldn't find or tap them. This is a great game, it's a shame the interface makes it unplayable.
Why is there no pass and play? Otherwise so far so good
Good UI but app sometimes crashes when AI is thinking. You cannot resume the play, you have to start new one. Sometimes even that doesn't help. Only cleaning cache of the app does.
Please update the app, needs to fit all screen sizes. Cant rate it if I can't play it.

Overall good but with some crashes or uncompleteable games causing issues. The AI is pretty good for the most part but when playing more than one they seem to team up, they'll end the game early while losing if another AI is winning.

Sound crackling since I've installed app on Huawei pro 30. This is a 5 star game when working correctly. I've paid for the expansions as well. Please update, to make this playable again on the latest android OS
Thank you guys, Race for the Galaxy means a lot to me, but can you update the app so that I can run it on a newer android OS?

Game needs an update. As others have stated, on my 8inch tablet I have to tap above and to the left of each icon for each action to register. Fix or will be requesting a refund. If that was fixed, it is a great implementation.
Game is not maintained! Doesn't work properly on latest version of androids and recent devices, the game screen resolution doesn't fit properly the screen of my device. Part of the UI is off screen.

Great game, fairly good app that generally provides a good experience. However, the AI can sometimes stall and cause the game to hang. I have also had games become uncompletable due to crashes which recur when attempting resume.
GREAT GAME! But it needs an update for newer phones. Scalling on UI is off.
Fantastic game. I have never played the physical version, but I enjoy this adaptation immensely.
I love this game, but it is pretty much unusable on the current version of Android. Please put out a new version!
Have been a massive fan of this game's paper version, and thanks to the great implementation/programming, the mobile version is just as fantastic. A must-play if you can afford it.

Edit: removing a star, you pushed an ad for your new game but still wont update/fix this one. This is a great game, it could really use a UI refresh. I am no developer but somewhere along the line of smartphone evolution the resolution changed and half of the text descriptions on all the zoomed in cards on my OnePlus 6T are cutoff. Game occasionally crashes but its easy to hop back in and you don't "lose" anything so its not a big deal to me

I LOVE THIS GAME! Needs refresh and update please. buggy in annoying ways and feels like it could use a slight refresh. Will get roll if at the very least we could get a stability update for this game! Thanks for making it so fun. Will update review to five stars on app update. Please?

Bug report: the game forces you to sell a single card through "pilgrimage world" (which would give 1-1=0 points) and subsequently the app crashes. It would be better if selling cards would only be possible when having more than 1 card to sell, OR giving the player the option to pass. Either way, the crash needs to be fixed😊

The buttons in the game respond to clicks that are not meant for the buttons. Eg. On my galaxy tab so I must click slightly up and to the left of the button I want. Even so, at some point this stopped working. Along with the fact that the last update was in 2018, I'm asking for a refund.
Touchscreen coordinates are WAY off on my 10 tablet. Unplayable.
great game, but the ai just hangs most games ( played with 3 hard ai's and all expansion packs)
Overall very good. I have a lot of games logged. Twice the game has got stuck on "AI running" and it appears the game freezes up. Nonetheless, great game.
The game works well on a Pixel 4. Great card game.
Will not work on my Android. Start game abd the screen blacks out and takes my phone to my lock out screen and continusly does it until i restart phone.

Works great aside from two issues. On my Galaxy S8, I cannot type in the text boxes, only numbers and some symbols will work, meaning my profile name is now +366... On my Vankyo Matrixpad s30 tablet there is an offset. Where I touch is not what is selected on the screen, it's offset by about the height of a phase icon. I really like this app and was about to buy an expansion but I think I'll wait until these get sorted.
Pewpew
Just like the board game. Well done.

It's a pretty decent port of the cardgame. Some of the mechanics dont quite translate directly as the boardgame version doesnt run duplicate cards. I also find it a bit annoying to track the state of other players board. If you enjoy Race for the Galaxy then this isnt a bad substitute for playing the IRL version.

Hopefully this is Beta feedback. Hitting the main menu button while in a game exited the app. The app icon is the old style of app icon. Search for adaptive icons for more info. When you have a wild die, the game frequently does not register that it is placed, enabling the okay button. You have to place will dice before pressing auto or it does not work. Placing all remaining wild dice after pressing auto does not enable the okay button.
Does not work with the current version of Android
Wonderful adaptation of the card game, easily playable online in realtime or asynchronous turns.
Needs notifications for online play. Games take forever because players need to keep logging in to see if it's their turn.
True to the board game. Plays flawlessly. AI pretty good, definite increments in different levels

Great game, was great app now long time since update and the resolution is wrong game outside phone borders. I can no longer start an online game but can still join online games. Not really sure why, maybe the start button is outside of what I can see on my OnePlus 6T. Please do something developers, I've paid for the game! Edit: I'm talking about the lack of updates! Last one from autumn 2018
replyContent: I'm not sure what update you are talking about, maybe your operating system update?  Please email info@templegatesgames.com with more info.

content: It crashes still sometimes, but it is very good.
Great implementation of the card game.

This is really a rather nice port of RftG when you want to play a few rounds but don't want to bother getting a group together (even online). Deducted a star for the following: -No 4th/5th expansions (the description fails to mention you can buy Brink of War) -The lack of support for 2 years -I wish the game had widescreen -The AI can be slow sometimes (but that's fine, really) If you are okay with getting a premium subscription, BoardGameArena's adaptation of the game is way more complete.

I love RftG and it's actually a 5 star but I just found a possible bug and I don't know how to report it. The game is forcing me to try to use a consume power the requires two goods. I consume traded so had two but now only have one good but the game seems to think I still have two goods.
replyContent: You can email info@templegatesgames.com and we can take a look.

content: Outstanding game! Really excited to see a digital release on Android! Having a major issue running it on my Samsung 12.2 Tablet. Crashes less than 1 minute in-game with error stating my tablet to overheating! Device isn't even warm to the touch in-game? Please help. UPDATE: Issues fixed! Game runs perfectly. Thanks developers!
Unable to play online against friends. It will not allow me to type in the box to send challenges.
replyContent: Some newer samsung phones come installed with an incompatible keyboard.  Change to the default keyboard and it should work!

content: As others have mentioned this has some serious UI flaws (button offsets, inability to change profile name due to keyboard inputs not received). For me they were so bad I couldn't even get to playing the game. Refund has been requested.
replyContent: Some newer samsung phones come installed with an incompatible keyboard.  Change to the default keyboard and it should work!

content: Great adaptation of the card game
No longer working with recent Android updates
The multiplayer screen is not sizing vertically correctly and crops the buttons . Every other screen seems to be fine.
Lenovo P10 smart tab: touch input is inaccurate (you need to click about an inch up to work). This makes the game difficult to play. I had to refund. Please notify when fixed.

Good port of an excellent boardgame. Yet, it's painful to play as there is an offset between where I touch the screen and where it's registered. This is really affecting the UX as selecting actions is rendered quite difficult. @devs: On my device, the aforementioned v-offset is about 1cm (a bit smaller than the height of an action button in 2-players expert mode). Hint: I had the same problem with Vivaldi browser and it is solved since its last update! You might consider contacting its dev team.
Game plays well, alignment off on Tab S6, so buttons often don't react the way they ought to. Needs an update.
Cant play it on my galaxy fold. Buttons in menus dont work... what a bummer.
I wanted to like this game, but on my Samsung S5e tablet, the x buttons do not work. I was unable to close the rulebook. I had it refunded.

Awesome implementation of the card game. Definitely helps to learn playing the physical game first. I still prefer playing the physical version solo but this is a great option when I can't play it physically.
Great game, I'm a big fan, but the AI can get stuck for 45+ seconds and the app can crash frequently
Honestly one of the best card games I've ever played.
Says built for older version, so I requested a refund
Just bought and launched. Was met with a notice that the application wasn't built for the current version of Android I'm running. (v10)

Mostly fine, but recent updates feel as tho the draw is fixed, potentially to goals if you include them. After playing so much, I always choose risky strats & ones that don't bank on goals to up the challenge. There's unlucky, then there's literally not drawing any non-military worlds in 6 turns when the goals are for military.
replyContent: Yeah there are some cases that really press the AI.  We've introduced a few limits but we could do more.  My own phone is a S6 and I haven't seen it quite as bad as you mention, but of course there could be cases we haven't run into.  We'll investigate to see if there are any performance improvements to make.  Thanks for the note.

content: Game is great. A wonderful deck building game which is different from the Ascension like ones. The only suggestion is to add a pass & play mode so we could play with others offline.
Fun strategy game with many ways to play and win.

Great game, some frustrating UI issues. Lack of zoom/pan is annoying. Cards often move around while you are trying to drag them. I very frequently accidentally place or discard the wrong card. If it is a free placement then there is no confirmation dialogue which means I have had countless games ruined. A simple undo the last action button or ensuring that all placements and payments (even if free) required confirmation would fix this.
Great mobile port of a great drafting/engine creation game
very good implementation
Good version of the game! My only complaints right now are: * Restoring my game history crashed the client * Forfeit tracking is broken
It's a good game. Works good on my phone, but on my tablet the on screen buttons don't work correctly (to push them it's a bit off). It's still good on my phone though.
Great game and I like the interface. I'm very disappointed that there is no local multiplayer mode.
Great game. Takes time to learn and the rules on the app are pretty rubbish - worth checking out the board game rules - but definitely worth the effort.
Fantastic card game
Great AI, sleek UI, overall one of the best board game apps out there, only Through the Ages can rival this one.

Race for the Galaxy is a great game, and I've had fantastic fun playing it on tabletop. The app does a good job of adapting it to an app. You don't have to worry about shuffling that increasingly large pile of cards (which can get rather ridiculous if you sleeve it), and counting the score is done for you. Playing against ai makes it possible to have fun playing "solo". You can play online with other players with difference correspondence time length (30 mins to 4 weeks).
Fun adaptation of the physical card game. The tutorial doesn't quite explain all the mechanics but learning to play and how cards work together is part of the fun!
Great phone port of a good game,AI Excellent. Bit expensive to get expansions.
Great representation of the card game, a few bugs with cards and notifications but nothing that prevents play. My friends and i have been playing for weeks now!
Crashes on my S8 every 3rd session or so. Crash is random.
needs more expansions!!!!

Would really like to delve into this game... seemed interesting on my phone but it was too small to play comfortably without eye strain. I was really looking forward to playing on my Samsung tablet but it turns out it is unplayable on newer screens due to restrictions on supported resolutions. Since my tablet hasn't any options for resolution adjustments, this game is a no go for me. Two stars for a bit of fun on my phone before the eye strain took hold.
Good
unplayable on a phone if your eyesight is not perfect.
User interface and AI players are pretty good. Network play is unreliable.

Great game, but it always asks me to update to the newest version because it was made for an older version of Android. Please update. I hope this game isn't being abandoned, because I love playing it.
Best card game ever. Period. End of story. Now give me the other expansions! Please. Thanks. And make the Roll for the Galaxy and New Frontiers apps. And Res Arcana.
Great!
Great experience, for a cel a bit small
Great version of a great game

I love this game, and the app is even better than the physical version. It's nearly perfect. all it's missing would be a few more options for multiplayer time limits. You can do 30 minutes, one week, or four weeks. 30 minutes is often too short, but a week is much too long! Why no option for one hour, or 24 hours? Two days? We need more options in between.
Very nice take on the board game. Has the occasional hiccup with notifications but worth your time.
replyContent: You can email info@templegatesgames.com and we can investigate.  Update: looks like you did and this has been resolved.

content: AUDIO broken on moto one vision
replyContent: Yeah sorry, phones with extreme aspect ratios made after the game was released aren't supported naively.  Please use whatever scheme your phone has to enable a legacy aspect ratio of 16x9.

content: Race for the Galaxy is an absurdly good card game.

Implementation of the card game is generally briliant. Game flow works well, great that you can always have a counter on opponents VPs. AI is challenging in hard mode. Only issue I have is that whenever I play a real person, the app suddenly crashes for no apparent reason. Very frustrating as those games are then gone and can never be re-started. Some guide for troubleshooting, FAQ or a way of contacting someone for help would be nice. Feel as though I've been left holding the bag with this one.
replyContent: You can email info@templegatesgames.com and let us know what you're seeing.

content: Excellent for a Quick Game against the AI

This is a very good game (even just playing vs. the AI). Unfortunely, its very difficult to enjoy it because of its incredibly high rate of crashing. This app crashes on me about once every 5 matches, and even if it doesn't crash, it can get stuck with the message "AI Running" at the end of every round for over a minute, which adds up. The cherry on top though, is that if it crashes and I try to start a new game, it has a high chance to crash again! It really pushes me away from the game...
replyContent: The majority of crashes we see are 'out of memory' scenarios.  We use about 500M of memory.  You can lower the memory requirement by using 'low graphics settings'.

content: Once you understand the rules, the app is quick and easy to play. Great boardgame engine builder

the rules used for resolution and card interaction feel diffrent from the card version. i wish all of the expansions were released inside the app. also, looking forward to Roll for the Galaxy app being released!
Great digital version of the card game that, in my opinion, makes the game even better. Great asynchronous play as well.

Was playing online regularly, now completely unable to play online under both wifi and mobile data conditions...I have uninstalled and reinstalled problem started before the most recent software update for my phone and persisted afterwards...
replyContent: Hmm, we have a lot of people playing multiplayer pretty consistently.  If you let us know more about your issue at info@templegatesgames.com we can help you out!

content: Even better than the tabletop version, just because of no setup time. Quick and easy to knock out several games of this in a row.
solid made game, crashes sometimes, not too often
It would be really nice if the single player options could be expanded.
Perfect!

Important point: as of 4/12/2019, this game only works correctly on screens with 16:9 aspect ratio. if you have an 18:9 screen (like I do), key parts of the UI get cut off and some information is not accessible. i managed to test on a friend's 16:9 tablet and it worked fine. it seems like a decent-enough game, the secret action-selection mechanic is the main thing that makes this game different than others. But it doesn't have crazy combos, so it feels more chess-y than star realms or Dominion

I used to enjoy this app a whole lot more when the notifications used to work on my pixel. But since an update a few months ago, i don't receive any more notifications. i play with several people at the same time, and there lack of notifications is really killing the momentum. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling it several times, as well as toggling the notification switch off and on. I would give it a 5 stars, but not while it's in the current state.
replyContent: You can email info@templgatesgames.com and we can help you out.  One thing to try with notifications is to make a new profile.  If that works and you receive notifications, lmk.  If it doesn't, the most likely cause is a system setting has disabled notifications.

content: enjoying the game, but would enjoy the option to restrict online players to join only one of my games at a time.

Fun game but can't have two devices online at the same time when both apps installed from Google play app store family library. Makes it impossible to play each other. Update: Thanks for the response, we did unlink the devices and can now play each other. I think we assumed device link was a way to link to devices to play over a shared wifi network rather than a way to link the same account across several devices.
replyContent: Sorry you ran into this issue.  When you have linked two profiles together using the 'device link' option they represent the same online account and cannot be online at the same time.  However, you can simply make a new profile (thus a new online account) to play multiplayer.

content: I think this might be the best app implementation of a tabletop board/card game I have ever encountered.  After installation of all the optional expansions, I noticed occasional slowdowns for AI decision making, but otherwise this is a remarkable package.  I appreciate the clear interface, and this is a great way to learn the real world game.  It's possible to complete a game against the AI in 10-15 minutes that would have taken 1-2 hours against typical human opponents.

Great digital implementation, but the expansions are fairly expensive and difficult to figure out. I wish there were expansion tutorials, especially for RvI, because I can't figure out how to use Prestige tokens for enhancing actions. It says in the rules to double tap; it doesn't work.

Played the card game for a few years ago. Just found this digital version and its perfect.  Very good multiplayer implementation (but more options for time limit wouldn't hurt (like, 10 min, 30 min, 24h ).  Is there away to enable this on steam after I have bought the android version without paying twice?
Excellent!
I play 2p online against my wife who also has the app and it works flawlessly. Great game and great implementation!
5 stars for the cusomter service alone!
Game is great, but since on my phone notifications are not working, playing is almost impossible...
replyContent: If you have any more information about this problem let us know at info@templegatesgames.com.  If you send us your username and friendcode we can look things up and try and investigate the issue.

content: I've played the card game for some time now, first because a friend showed up one day with it on our game nights and later I bought it for myself.. Finding it on digital version for the cellphone was one of the most exciting things to happen this week... Since my friend moved away some time back I haven't played as often as before and now I can play anywhere, anytime
absolutely amazing, best card game ever, please port all the expansions, I'll buy every one of them!

This is a perfect implementation of Race for the Galaxy. If you like the table-top game, you will like the app. Everything is intuitive and attractive and works flawlessly.   Kudos to the developers, this is really fantastic work.   Literally, the ONLY comment I have regarding improvement is that, unless I'm missing something, when I change devices, I lose my profile and game data?   BUY THIS APP!
replyContent: If you have any specifics let us know at info@templegatesgames.com and we'll do what we can to fix 'em!

content: UPDATED REVIEW: I upped review to 5 stars because after I made my previous review in 2017, the developers updated the app and added the record keeping stats I wanted. This is a great implementation of Race. The only problem now is the community of players. There are too many players who will forfeit late in a game when it is clear they are losing. This is very frustrating, especially in 3-4 player matches. Forfeiters are terrible ppl. If you forfeit, AI should takeover, the game shouldn't end.
good app hard to play with friends online
Awesome

amazing! so much fun! feels so much like the real life game. great UI. having multiple games at once is great. love the 7 day lobby feature. some friends cant sit and play a game all at once so its nice to pick it back up a couple hrs later. will def buy the expansions too!! one of my favourite games of all time
Great game. But I'd like to buy the expansions in the play store, so I can share it with my family.
The online game play is currently broken

Fun game, though I'm not very good at card games. I would like it if there was an in app option just browse the cards for each set, definitely after I've bought it, but maybe even before hand. It sucks having to play with the cards before you get a chance to read them. I'm giving it a 5, cause I like it so much. But I feel it deserves a 4 for the sometimes crashes, sometimes long AI calculations and serious battery drain. (galaxy note 4)
Fantastic implementation of a great card game. Thank you for the color deficiency improvements, too!

One of the best programmed games in the store. Looks beautiful and has wonderful depth. Once You understand the complex rules, it's easy to play. Good AI. Worth the money for such a unique and entertaining card game.
I love the game. I wish it didn't slow down so much though. At the end of a four player (you and 3 AIs) it gets ultra slow between choosing actions. Like minutes of wait time...
replyContent: Good point, thanks for the feedback.  We'll see if a delay makes sense.  Thanks!

content: Complex better once you get it

LOVE the game. The AI is great. Implementation of the game works very well most of the time. The UI is seriously lacking, though. Would love to see some way to track games played against others and maybe some way to communicate with other players. Why do I have to wait for others to take actions that are supposed to be done simultaneously. I have no idea what determines what order things are done. Also, for the amount of money spent on this app, it crashes unacceptably often, as do the online servers. Please update soon and often! This game is too good to be this frustrating.
Love it! But I must say... the server has been down pretty often these days. What is going on?
What Brian said - this is a great implementation of the IRL game to digital.

Awesome game!!! It has taken me a couple of days to work out how to play, but that has been part of the fun. I have also purchased the two expansions and hope there are more to come.😀 Still playing this a year later, love it!
Excellent adaptation of one of the very best board games on the market.
An excellent and faithful rendition of the card game. Controlling the cards on the table is easy to do and considering the amount of information on screen the layout is is intuitive and easy to view.

Implementation is pretty good, but it is basically impossible to recover your account if you have to wipe data or change phones. Can you please allow adb backup so that those who know how can save their account info?
replyContent: Yeah, we've gotten that feedback from a few places and definitely felt some of those issues.  We're working on a solution now and should be able to have something for the next expansion, if not sooner.  Thanks for the note!

content: One of our favorite table games and now we can keep playing even when not at home together! This is a great app! Bring in more expansions please!?!

Love this game, it's my go to for killing time and stress relief. There is 
an annoying AI bug that just hangs or crashes the app. Also after 
restarting my phone the first message I get before other apps load is that 
race for galaxy crashed. Sounds like lingering processes

Ok, I love RftG and the gameplay of this app works pretty well. But the 
bugs and missing features in this app drive me nuts. No chat feature (aka 
no table/trash talk). No zoom. I have a non-XL phone, it's painful 
sometimes. They do have a hold/double-tap on items, but hitting the right 
spot is tricky -- more than once I have screwed myself by inadvertently 
"passing" when I was trying to see the status of a goal. No acct mgmt. Lose 
your phone? Have to reset data or reinstall app? You start over from 
scratch. You get a new friend code that you have to resend to all your 
friends that are pissed off that they can't finish the orphaned games that 
have been going for a week or so. They have this "device link" feature that 
should allow you to transfer, but evidently it changes periodically. (I 
just had to reset my phone and the code I saved a month or so ago was 
evidently "expired") Again, RftG is great. The decent gameplay of this app 
tricks you into coming back. But it is soooo frustrating that they didn't 
implement this better.
Desparately needs Pass n Play!

Crashes have been fixed, but these long ai (1 minute plus?!) waits are for 
the birds.
replyContent: So sorry about this.  Our latest patch should correct this (build 1376).

content:
Fantastic implementation of a great game marred by technical issues because 
I play it constantly. 1) The Android version crashes a lot, and takes a 
very long time to open even if it is running in the background. 2) My 
girlfriend stopped getting notifications from the iOS version so she 
doesn't know when it's her turn.

each game is quite short and not so interesting. it's not awful, it's ok, 
but i can't see me playing it much. through the ages is much, much more 
fun. and the text is too small on a phone.

Great game well executed on mobile. Wish there was a chat feature in game. 
Also I am not getting any notifications on my Pixel 2 but I got a 
notification on my Chromebook.
This is a wonderful implementation of a great boardgame.
Good but missing that vital pass n play feature

Used to be 5 star but now it crashes way too often, and once it does 
there's no way to recover the game. Still great when I'm able to finish a 
game.

Amazing game. This game may be tough to play on a phone but is perfect on a 
tablet. The controls are extremely well done, and create a very smooth 
experience, which really helps given the complexity of the game.

Really enjoying the game!  I have played dozens upon dozens of games, and I never thought that I would be able toget a chance to play RftG based on my play group.  So much so that I have gotten the first two expansions and am not opposed to getting the final one at some point.  One minor point though.  I have been playing vs the AI using the RVI scenario lately and every single time it starts me off with the Rebel world.  There have been previous times when I might get the Imperial world, but not anymore, its just all rebels all the time.  Bug or feature?

Great software, but unplayable without push notifications. My friend with 
his brand new s9 plus and my other friend with his one plus 3t just don't 
receive any notifications. I would gladly rate this 5 but this bug prevents 
us from playing it multiplayer.
Beyond addictive

Great virtual version of the game. I think I found a bug though. I was unable to use the imperium planet buster on an opponent who had a -1 military development but had an overall positive military score. Idk if I can send replays but it lost me the game pretty handedly.
Why am I getting ads all of a sudden? I payed for this game and I keep getting ads after every turn.
Won't work with Galaxy S9+ loads to play new game or online and then crashes, every time.
Game is fun, mechanics are solid, AI is decent. Despite all that, the game constantly crashes and AI can get hung up
an amazing digital version of one of my most beloved games. addictive as ever, with simple interface and loads of replay value.
Amazing adaptation of the renowned card game. Works surprisingly well even on phone screens.
Perfect adaptation of the card game
Great port! Only suggestion: card zoom can be improved -- showing the large cards side by side, rather than one per screen, would help.

I've played the card game.  The game play in the app is very close to it, so if you like the cards you'll like the app.  It's similar to the cards as you are not so much playing against your opponent as you are trying to simply build a better "empire" as fast as you can.  Faster than your opponent, AI or human.  It's better than the card game because it manages the rules for you.  This let's you learn and improve your game quickly.  It plays better on a tablet than a phone because there's a lot of detail to see.  Lot's of fun.  Thank you to the developers.
Good AI, but expansions cost a lot more than the listed price even after currency conversion. (I assume the "$3.99" must be in USD.)

The game looks and plays great on my phone, but when attempting to play on my nexus 7 tablet I am unable to enter a user name and when trying, the screen shifts weirdly forcing me to quit the app. Fix this and you'd have a 5* app.  EDIT: the issue was being caused by a conflict with Swiftkey, everything works perfectly without that active. changed star rating to reflect issue being resolved, though it would be nice if there weren't conflicts with custom keyboards. For the record, Swiftkey doesn't cause an issue on my phone, only on the tablet.
replyContent: We've had reports that some keyboards (often custom ones) cause issues.  If you can try with a different keyboard that might help.  If that doesn't work let us know at info@templegatesgames.com and we can dig into it further.

content: AWESOME port! Great visuals and very slick, intuitive controls. Very well done!

Online play turn timer needs to be adjust to 1hour, 1 day and 1 week. 30 mins is too short and 4 weeks too long. Sometimes times out a game even though I've completed my turn. Time remaining should be displayed. Otherwise great game made digital.
Would be 5 stars but does not work properly on Nexus 9 tablet. Keyboard code entry is broken. Works fine on Nexus 6 phone, but I need a larger screen.
replyContent: We've had reports that some keyboards (often custom ones) cause issues.  If you can try with a different keyboard that might help.  If that doesn't work let us know at info@templegatesgames.com and we can dig into it further.  We'll be investigating this issue further since there seem to be handful of keyboards with this problem.

content: Really great game of a fun card game. I definitely recommend watching a few YouTube videos before playing tho.

Great gameplay, but my girlfriend and I get incredibly frequent crashes when playing over the network. Literally every 2-5 minutes, which makes it extremely frustrating to play together. Both using Oneplus Ones. If not for this, it would be an instant 5-star :(

Does anyone have a problem with receiving push notifications for this game? I'm currently not receiving any. I have a Samsung Galaxy S8. I ensured I enabled push notifications and even did some other tweaks to the OS but I still am not receiving push notifications.
This is my favorite game. I play this maybe six times a day. I may never stop.

Its a good port of the board game.  I like everything design wise.  But it suffers heavily from a lack of pass and play option.  I want to play against people not just some ai and Im not nornally online.  5 star if it had pass and play but lack thereof is a downer.
replyContent: Yeah very sorry about this.  We tried a few variants but since Race is so simultaneous and not split up into discreet turn we found we the game suffered from a very poor ratio of 'passes' to 'plays'.  Coming up with a variant to solve that problem is on our todo list, but is a pretty hard problem.  Thanks for the note!

content: I  bought all 3 expansions and won't let me install on my kids tablet...so apparently the expansions are for only 1 device? THAT BLOWS...hence only 2 stars for a good game otherwise
replyContent: If you use the same google play account, purchases (including expansions) should be shared.  If the device is older (circa 2012 or earlier) we might just not support the device (the requirements are KitKat os (4.4) and above and opengl es 2.0).  If you like, feel free email info@templegatesgames.com and we can try and dig deeper.

content: Great fun, and very challenging! Learn the game and know what you are doing!
replyContent: We got your report and are looking into it.  Thanks.

content: Great conversion. Easy to play, good controls & easy identification of game elements. Worth picking up!

Seems about a perfect port of a classic game. I have occasional drag issues with goods, but a very minor thing. Hard to see opponent tableaus at a glance, too, but that is true in the real game as well.

Edit: previously mentioned major bugs are fixed, still a few minor ones but nothing too crazy.  This game is a very good re creation of the board game using the Keldon ai. The user interface is very friendly and does a good job of bringing out the artwork in the cards.  I look forward to the remaining two expansions being added.
replyContent: Thanks for the report, we're investigating and should have a fix for the next patch.

content: Great game. Vs ai never gets boring
replyContent: Thanks for the info we'll investigate.  If you have any more info, please email info@templegatesgames.com.  Screenshots or anything like that help a bunch!

content: Really cheeky making people rebuy the expansions for each system (unlike say Star Realms). The timeout system is opaque: needs to give better warnings, and needs to have an option for longer times between turns. Sick of coming back after a day or so and finding it's timed out all our games.
replyContent: Sorry we use the stores' payment/entitlement schemes which are unable to do cross platform entitlements. The longest timer is now 4 weeks per player.  If you are having games set with a longer timer and having games time out in 'a day' please email info@templegatesgames.com with any more info you have and we can investigate.  Thanks for the report

content: Solid implementation of a modern classic; probably better on a pad than a phone for newcomers who don't know the cards yet
It's really well designed! If I bought the expansions on another Android device, how do I enable them for this device?
replyContent: If you are using the same Google account (can find by opening Google Play and looking make sure the email address there matches) you should have access on both devices.  Some folks have reported needing to wait and potentially  reboot the phone.  If none of this works for you email info@templegatesgames.com and we can investigate further.

content: Excellent implementation of a very good card game. Highly recommend working through additional expansions as your skill evolves. Have encountered game ending bugs and stats resetting after updates (which is unfortunate, given the hundreds of games I've played), but the Dev team has been regularly supporting the app and adding expansions.  Suggested for anyone that is looking for a deep, fast strategic resource building card game.
Loved this board game Always wanted to play it over and over again.
Great game. Good execution
replyContent: Thanks for helping us out!

content: I have easily played this more than any other game.
***Update 3: game always resume to 1 exact same game if exit and  app reload - Nexus 5X Android 7.1.2
replyContent: Will do!  Please update to 1314.  Thanks!

content: Awesome, especially on a tablet or a chromebook.
Good adaptation. Slow AI with latest BoW expansion (over 30 secs at times on my Samsung Tab S2).
replyContent: Whoa it shouldn't be that long.  We'll investigate.  We don't have a Tab S2 but we'll run on some of our other older Android devices.  We were thinking our iPad2 was a good min-spec device but maybe that's not the case.  Thanks for the note!

content: Great implementation of game.  AI is excellent.
Crashes immediately on loading. Came back to the store for a refund but the refund button has now been replaced with uninstall.  Waste of money.
replyContent: I'm sorry you are having difficulties.  Email us at info@templegatesgames.com and we can help you out!

content: Great app. Please add a 28-day option for async games. At 7-days, games played at a pace of a or two a day typically time out before finishing.
replyContent: Will do!

content: Amazing! It's a fantastic game where you build different engines to score points. A little difficult for the first 3 games. Then it blossoms.
Regret buying this, and I enjoy the card game.  The fonts and entire user interface are too small and a strain to read on my Pixel 2 screen.

Edit: After a reset the game is working fine.  I bought this when it came out and got a refund because the touch control didn't work properly. Now I bought it again after a few updates. I always have to touch slightly under the button I want. Also, the UI doesn't seem to scale properly. I can't see my opponent's tableau. Running the game on nvidia shield k1 tablet with the latest update.

Great game, but room for improvement.  Overall, this is a well-implemented game. My major issue is with notifications. In short, I don't get them consistently. My friends that I play with don't get them either.  In addition, it would be nice if AI players could fill in for players that time out, rather than ending the whole game (see Lords of Waterdeep). Finally, it would be nice to know exactly which player is holding up the game so we can notify them.
A great adaptation of a favorite game!  Vs ai is fun and sufficiently challenging and the multi player works well consistently.

I absolutely adore this port. I've probably put more hours into this game than any other phone game.  It crashes on occasion during games, and currently reliably crashes whenever I try to start a new. But I won't let technical hiccups mar my feelings for this game.
This is an excellent port of the card game. I would have rated it 5 stars if not for the lack of pass-and-play, which feels like an obvious oversight and will limit how much I play.
Well made game that's accurate to the original and with a good online multiplayer mode.

Bardzo dobra gra karciana. Ale... brak możliwości instalacji na SD I na razie tylko 2 rozszerzenia z 5... ---- RFTG one of my favorite card games. Rating for app could be higher  if game had more expansions ( I see tahat there are serious problems with recognisions); any non essential app over 25 MB SHOULD have install to SD option or it is unistalled - space is limited.
The cross-platform, in-your-pocket, gameplay is worth it alone but it's just great how polished this is as an experience 💚👍
Needs cloud saving, there is no way to save your record or compare to others if you switch devices.

RftG has always been an inoffensive "Engine Builder For Dummies" game. Luck of the draw makes this game the equivalent of Uno In Space. Also, the Hard AI is a total cheat, drawing perfectly synergistic cards and combos while you constantly pull garbage that looks like it belongs a storm drain.
replyContent: Holy moly, sounds like this game might not be you're cup of tea! If you email info@templegatesgames.com we can hook you up with a refund. As an aside, the AI plays completely 'fairly,' with no special draws or knowledge, but yeah, it often seems like it always gets what it needs :) Also, mind if we use "Uno in Space" for our next band name?

content: Initially purchased because it supported Google's Family Library and was looking forward to playing with my brother. Somehow it got bugged and initially wouldn't let us play together; however, I emailed the developers and they promptly responded and walked me through how to resolve my issue (uninstall, reboot, reinstall). Looking forward to playing my brother soon!
Buggy (Pixel C).  Screen flickers sometimes and sometimes when I launch the game, I end up on my lock screen.
replyContent: Thanks for the report.  We'll see if we can get our hands on that device to make improvments!

content: This thing is fantastic; an excellent port of my favorite board game. Great production values. I can tell a lot of love went into this. Buy it now.
Best android game I've played.  Fast, fun, and addictive with challenging AI. The expansions add a lot to the game.
Wonderful version of the acclaimed card/boardgame. I really don't want to sound like a bot, but I seriously can't stop playing this game. If I could I would rate more than 5 stars.
Great adaptation but 30 min is an awkward turn timer for a live game. That could take 15 minutes a game or all day. Can we get an option for 1 or 2 minutes?
Great implementation of a great board game. Online play is simple and easy.
Love it but had to reinstall due to multiple crashing issues. Now I've lost my whole profile and online games in progress.
Please fix issue with RVI expansion where I never get to start with Imperium against computer... I always get the Rebel start world.
"Drop Ships" is bugged. Wouldn't let me play it even though I had more than enough cards.
replyContent: A common case for this is if you have Drop Ships already in play, a second copy isn't allowed.  We'll be adding some UI to help clarify this case.  If it's something else, email a screenshot to info@templegatesgames.com and we'll investigate further.

content: I really liked this game. But I don't know what was updated but the app doesn't work anymore.
replyContent: Email an information you have to info@templegatesgames.com and we'll try and investigate further.

content: Perfect adaptation. The controls can be unresponsive  (everything but card play), otherwise great. It can use a mulligan house rule option.
No crashes as reported by others. Nice gameplay.
Excellent game, works well on mobile! Mistook the "Device Link" feature for a multiplayer feature at first.
This is a great game and this app makes it really easy to learn and easy to pick up. Would be awesome if there were more of the expansions available.
Bought both expansions. I rarely can play the expansions lately since the game doesn't believe that i purchased the expansions.
replyContent: We've had a few reports of this.   Most of the time this just just 'goes away' after a bit.  You can try rebooting the game or the entire phone.  If nothing works email info@templegatesgames.com and we can investigate.

content: An excellent conversion of the card game. My only criticism is that it is too addictive!!
Awesome game, easy to learn hard to master. I highly recommend it.
Great adaptation of the card game! I can't wait for more expansions!
Awesome strategy card game. Good implementation.

Excellent adaptation of a card game I've loved. Only issue is the absence of a notification system which tells you when it's your turn in a multiplayer game. This really slows down the multiplayer turn rate due to players having to wait for eachother to realise it's their turn and play.
Nexus 6 on project fi; crashes frequently while playing online (like 5 times a game).   Besides the need to reopen constantly, the game itself is great.
Update: Amazing devs helped solve my problem! Fantastic! Now I can play the best implementation of my fave tabletop game anywhere I please. Which may actually not be a good thing...
replyContent: Heh, I dunno if we can patch a fix for that problem ;)  Glad you're enjoying the game!

content: This is a fun game but, it keeps crashing.
replyContent: Hi, can you email info@templegatesgames.com with any more info?  What version, what device, when it crashes, etc.  Thanks for the note!

content: Cuts off the top 1/5th of the screen on 4:3 form factor tablets
replyContent: Oh no!  We should be handling those (ipads are that ratio) so obviously somethings amiss. If you could would you mind sending a screenshot to info@templegatesgames.com along with your device and we'll try to get it worked out.  Thanks for the report!

content: Well done. Love that cross platform capability. Here's hoping someone gets an Roll for the Galaxy on an app eventually.

Great game. UI is very well done. Thank you for the updates and player stats! Upgraded to 5 stars. (Too bad it's not retroactive but still great).  A couple new suggestions: (1) can you make better use of the top portion of the screen in a 2 player game? For example the player name is very small on phones. There seems to be a lot of space on the top right. (2) how about player presence? Is my opponent in the current game, in RFTG or outside the app? So I don't sit there waiting for a move if they are not there :)
replyContent: Yeah, the 'waiting/your turn' isn't quite ideal - it actually goes to 'your turn' when someone is waiting on you, which is not quite the same as when you can take a turn. There might be something buggy too, we'll keep an eye out. An online indicator just missed being in the next patch, prob will be in the next one. +1 for msgs. Thx for the notes!

content: Okay have not owned this yet. But got this digital to check out. Love this. My only thing it says should work on my Tablet but I just get black screen. Hopefully​ they are working on that.  Update: still love and now works on tablet.

I have loved the physical version of this game for years. This app is a very faithful adaptation and gives me the experience of the gameplay while also handling all the cleanup and bookkeeping. I have played so many games so far between my phone and tablet that I lost track how many. Easily dozens per day.  I had some initial issues with the UI, but it seems to have smoothed out now. I would like to see a player statistics page, but not before more expansions.  Keep up the good work Devs!
This would be a four or maybe a five star app if it weren't for the constant crashes on the server's end.
replyContent: Sorry, there was an issue with the update patch, but it should be fixed now.  Thanks for the report!

content: Would be 5 stars if I could enter a profile, but the keyboard doesn't work. Samsung Galaxy 5
replyContent: Do you have a custom keyboard?  We've had a few reports of this issue.  Email info@templegatesgames.com with any more info you have.

content: Board game itself is amazing, but the app can do with a bit more help. Tutorial is not clear enough on all the icon meaning, so very confusing. Can do with some better example. There isn't a full rule book to refer to, so I have to go online to search for it. I also suggest have a card galley such that you know what else is in the deck (and will attract me to buy expansion too as I see all those nice card I may want to try).  The AI movement needs to have a "slow" choice or some better log, as I keep losing to hard at the beginning but I don't understand why as they move so quick and no explanation.  Also, I might have see that AI keeps getting production  I on windfall world...and that may explain why i cannot win computer.....With these said, I still give it a five because it is an amazing game, I just want it to take the next step. Recommend it !!
Temple Gates Games did a fantastic job of capturing the card game. The AIs are quite challenging.  They have been communicative and quick with fixes. Fun game.  5 stars.

My favorite game these days! Definitely worth the price. It's easier to play than the original card game, because the symbols are all explained in popup tooltips. In fact, I've played this more times in the past month than I've played the physical game, which I've owned for years.    My only beef, and what keeps this from being a 5star review, is that the push notifications for this app are unreliable on my phone. I'll often open the app and it'll say "waiting for opponent's turn." But then if I close the app and reopen it, it'll say it's my turn. *Sometimes* I get an Android notification telling me when it's my turn. Annoying.
replyContent: Thanks for the note - we'll look into the notification issue!

content: Recent update has removed purchases? Is there a way to restore them?
replyContent: Should be fixed in build 1346.  So sorry about this!

content: Great adaptation of the card game, keep up the good work!

This is how all board game adaptations should be. My friends and I love playing this because of its relative lack of bugs and the asynchronous play, and it stays true to form to the original game. Thank you so much!
Fantastic game, play it all the time
replyContent: Sorry, it's $6.99 for the base game and $3.99 for the expansions :)

content: Needs a color blind mode. As simple as stating the type of good on the card would be perfect. Red, green, and brown are very hard to tell the difference. Other than that issue, it's a good game.

I love Race, but there are a few hiccups that are preventing me from giving it a 5. The game crashes fairly regularly and sometimes prevents reopening an AI match, the multiplayer is devoid of players for the most part, and the expansions will occasionally disappear from my library. Once those problems get fixed I will totally rate this a 5. Everything else is fantastic!
replyContent: What device are you mostly playing on?  And if possible can you press the 'report' key after a crash?  We're not seeing a lot of crashes like you've describe (we did during the beta, but most of those have been corrected).  If you have any more info please let us know at info@templegatesgames.com

content: The game is awesome and very well done. Cards are a little squashed on a phone (Nexus 6P) but you get used to it. Enlarging the cards and swiping through is a little slow with the animation.   On my Nexus 7, Screensize is MUCH better but there is a touch issue where I have to press half an inch lower on the screen then where I should in the UI which make it unplayable.
replyContent: I have a 2012 era nexus 7 here with 5.1 kitkat and we don't see that issue, and haven't heard anything else quite like that...  It's possible it has something to do with the software home/back button bar...  If you could email an more information you're having about this issue to info@templegatesgames.com we can investigate further!

content: Only short coming with this game is multiplayer. I have two Android devices and I cannot figure out a way to have my profile shared between them. Seems like the profile name should be globally unique and and device with my Google account should be able to access it.
replyContent: Device linking will be coming in the next patch!

content: Great implementation of one of the best card games on the market.
best app of a board game i've played so far
Great mobile adaptation of a great boardgame!  Any plans to add the other expansions?!
replyContent: Yep - we'll get to the other expansions as soon as we can!

content: Could really benefit from a hot seat mode where you pass the device around.
replyContent: Turns out pass and play has way more passing than playing in a simultaneous play game like Race, unfortunately.  We might look into a nearfield/bluetooth though to help with that.  Course that would take multiple devices which not everyone has, but would help some folks.  Thanks for the note.

content: Whenever I try to type my name in the profile section, the keyboard pops up, but if I move to press a key, it disappears. I can't type anything into my profile name.  Even though I like playing the game
replyContent: We've had some reports of issues w/ custom keyboards.  If you are using one disabling it to enter your name might help.  (And if this is the case lmk the custom keyboard at info@templegatesgames.com and we can try and get it fixed as well!)

content: Purchased both expansions and now the game doesn't recognize it. It asks me to purchase again, but they buy button doesn't even work. What a waste of money.
replyContent: Yeah this seems to be a problem on the GoogLe side. Things that seem to work: rebooting the phone, rebooting the app, just waiting. Please email info@templegatesgames.com if none of these help!

content: It's a great port of the card game that got me into board game.
Love RFTG and I love this implementation.

i bought this app and liked it. Then I dish out $8 more for the two expansions. The problem is that often when I go into the app the expansions options are grayed out, even though I bought them. Please fix or give me refund for the expansions.  Edit: The problem seems to be fixed. I upgraded my rating.
replyContent: Yeah this seems to be a problem on the GoogLe side. Things that seem to work: rebooting the phone, rebooting the app, just waiting. Please email info@templegatesgames.com if none of these help!

content: Great game but I can't access my addons half the time.  It just prompts me to rebuy them.  Not very fun to spend a extra $4 on an expansion you can only use 50% of the time...
replyContent: We've had a few reports of this, reboozing you app, phone, or reinstalling seems to correct the problem. It seems to be a Google problem but we'll keep investigating to see if theres something more we can do.

content: A fantastic implementation. I've been looking forward to a mobile adaptation for a while now. Thanks so much! If I feel that a particular card wasn't scored or functioned properly, where do I submit a bug report?
replyContent: Any bugs, or suggestions or whatever can go to info@templegatesgames.com.

content: Edit since update: fantastic job on this app, congrats!!!
replyContent: Thanks for helping us out with your reports!

content: This is a pretty great version of one of my favorite games. Perfect for quick games on the train. It can sometimes be difficult to read the small numbers on a phone screen, but other than that this game is fantastic.
Great port of the table top game
Great implementation, although Pan-Galactic Council seems to be bugged. Easy interface and helpful tutorial.
replyContent: Yeah, Pan-Galactic Research doesn't count for the 6pt(?) goal because it doesn't have variable victory points.  We're going to try to make that clearer in a future patch.  Sorry about that!

content: Loved the board game.

I can't believe this doesn't have pass and play functionality. That's the whole reason I wanted this game. $7 to play against crappy AI's, no thank you! Buy the physical card game but avoid this app! I want my money back!
replyContent: Yeah sorry, turns out pass and play doesn't work very well with a synchronous game. We tried a handful of pass and play variants and realized it would take a redesign of the game to make it work.  A lot of folks are interested in pass and play, though, so it might be something we look into for the future. Thanks for the note!

content: Awesome  version of the best card game ever.  I love the way other players'  tableau are represented on the screen - excellent way to keep the screen uncluttered.  Multiplayer is good, and Keldon's AI presents the right level of single player challenge, with options to adjust the difficulty.  Highly recommended.
An absolutely sensational implementation of one of (if not the greatest) card games of all time. Worth every penny.
Polished. Interface is very intuitive.
Great implementation of the card game. I love that I can play it at time now. AI is challenging and fun, great job all around!

This game would be perfect except for two things: 1) no hot seat multiplayer, and 2) the online multiplayer seems flakey.  I would like to have the ability to play my wife or other friends locally with a pass and play local hot seat multiplayer. I know this could be tedious given the simultaneous nature of RftG, but it works okay for San Juan.  Also, I joined an online multiplayer game, selected my starting world, discarded some cards and then it said waiting for opponent and it hasn't come back yet. Also I exited the game and went back in and now it forgot which cards I discarded.  Great game, could be a lot better!
replyContent: Async multiplayer is on a lot of wishlists, and you are spot on with the analysis of the hot-seat issues. We're adding timers to online games next patch that should help with the zombie players.  And yeah, there's a bug/oversight with multiplayer where it doesn't show your last actions - not ideal and on the todo list. Thanks for the notes!

content: Heard about this game from Theresa on Vidjagame Apocalypse! Great game, so addictive and fun!
Amazing port. Hope to see support for Alien Artifacts soon enough! And maybe an optional progression system of some sort-- ranks, or ELO like in BGA?
replyContent: We're looking to add a 'ranked' mode as the player pool grows.  And then on to expansions as soon as we can!

content: Great port of the card game, AI is a good challenge.
Excellent conversion
Best board/card game app I've played since the AI is a challenge and interface is clean
Fantastic port of both my favorite game ever and Keldon's AI. I'd been waiting for this Android version for years! Worth every cent. Thank you!
Game crashes during tutorial military mission
replyContent: Should be fixed in the latest patch (1313).  Sorry about this!

content: It is small but workable on phone.
Game is currently crashing on seccond tutorial mission
replyContent: Should be fixed in the latest patch.  Thanks for letting us know!

content: Everything you love about the card game without all the math.
Has a black screen on a Samsung Galaxy Tab E unfortunately...
replyContent: Thanks for letting us know.  We just ordered a Galaxy Tab and will be investigating.

content: Great app with great controls. Often times the online play button is inaccessible.  Hope this gets solved.   Also would be nice if some online play stats were kept.
replyContent: Stats will be coming next patch.  And we're looking into the play button getting disabled.  Thanks for playing!

content: I love the physical version of this game and I was very excited to finally have a mobile version. The UI is clean and scales well to a small screen, and the AI is fair on normal difficulty and not too hard or easy. All and all very worth the price point, very willing to pay for quality.
Very user friendly online version of the card game I love the most.
An excellent implementation of an excellent game. Plays smoothly and runs well on my phone (LG 3G, about 2 years old).
This is the best digital version of RftG that you can play. Truly excellent.
Great implementation of the game!

Overall a FANTASTIC implementation of a great tabletop card game. A few of the interface controls could use some tweaking but they're still very good. I'm very happy with this app, and can easily recommend it for fans of the classic tabletop game.
Awesome port of a great game.
Great implementation of the board game. The tutorial is SO well done too, you're up and playing the game in no time at all. Highly recommend for fans of the series.
Excellent app. Very solid implementation of the physical game. Developers are quick to respond to inquiries and fix issues. Hope they add some W/L stats! Highly recommended.
replyContent: Thanks for helping us with your compatibility issues.  We're working on a stats system too for the next major patch!

content: Played during beta on Nexus 6p and didn't have any issues. Am an experienced player of the board game and have been waiting years for a proper digital rendition and this was worth the wait. I love that offline mode is truly offline and doesn't need to phone home to activate or check anything as I'll be traveling overseas soon and can play on the plane. A lot of things will be on the screen especially for a 4p goals game but it still feels manageable to play on my phone. Very well done job to temple games. I thank you!
Great implementation of the board game. Love the easy-to-read, pop up text when viewing cards.
Excellent adaptation of my favorite card game. The developer's passion shines through.
I am a strong man, but I wept openly when I played this game, for I knew there would be no greater moment in my life.
One of the best app to board implementations.  Many other apps feel clunky or have subpar graphics and animations.  Everything here is polished.  Looking forward to Alien Artifacts!
I was in the beta and the devs have done a great job. I'm looking forward to the Alien Artifacts expansion.
Excellent adaptation of the fantastic card game by Tom Lehmann. Can't wait for the Alien Artifacts expansion!
